projects.title: VenturePoint Egypt - Economic Development Platform
projects.description: Engineered a high-performance full-stack web platform for a leading economic consulting firm. Migrated legacy Node.js infrastructure to a vertically optimized AMP stack (Apache, MySQL, PHP), achieving a 98% reduction in page load latency (60s to <1s). Designed a custom CMS with granular role-based access control (RBAC), secure file management, and integrated real-time analytics dashboards.

projects.title: The Ouroboros House - Recursive Horror Experience
projects.description: Developed a psychologically immersive horror game in 96 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2025. Implemented non-Euclidean level design techniques to create seamless recursive environments. Programmed dynamic event triggers and atmospheric audio systems to build tension without relying on jump scares. Praised for its narrative integration and innovative use of loop mechanics.

projects.title: Custom Engine 2D Platformer (Dark Souls Inspired)
projects.description: Built a feature-rich 2D game engine from scratch using pure C# without external frameworks. Implemented a custom physics engine, state-machine based AI behaviors (patrols, combat, vision cones), and a component-based entity system. Features complex combat mechanics including melee parries, ranged energy projectiles, and responsive hitboxes.

projects.title: Little Adventurer Andie - Mechanics Prototype
projects.description: A polished 2D platformer serving as a technical showcase for Godot engine capabilities. Implemented advanced character controllers with coyote time and jump buffering for tight, responsive controls. Constructed modular tile-based environments and reusable UI components. Demonstrates mastery of Godot's node system and signal-based architecture.

projects.title: Godot Educational Platformer
projects.description: An educational project focusing on the core principles of game loop implementation and object-oriented practices in GDScript. Served as a foundational study in physics interactions, scene management, and asset integration within the Godot ecosystem.

projects.title: C++ Console Engine Game
projects.description: A raw C++ console application rendering real-time ASCII graphics. Engineered a custom rendering loop handling screen buffer updates for flicker-free visuals. Implemented grid-based collision logic and simple enemy AI tracking, demonstrating low-level understanding of memory and game loop architecture.

projects.title: Professional Portfolio
projects.description: Responsive personal branding website built with semantic HTML5 and modern CSS3. Features hardware-accelerated CSS animations, a custom particle system for visual depth, and a mobile-first responsive grid layout. optimized for SEO and accessibility.
